content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage at Position (x=52.5, y=-84.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=53.0, y=-83.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=52.5, y=-84.5)

### Copper and Iron Ore Mining at Position (x=-25.0, y=-64.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-25.0, y=-64.0) connected to a series of Transport Belts leading to a drop position at (x=-25.5, y=-65.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage at Position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5)

### Iron Plate Production at Position (x=0.0, y=0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=0.0, y=0.0)

### Iron Plate Storage and Transfer at Position (x=-16.5, y=-64.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-16.5, y=-64.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-17.5, y=-64.5) transferring items from a Stone Furnace at position (x=-19.0, y=-65.0) to the Wooden Chest

### Coal Storage at Position (x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=3.5, y=0.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (x=2.5, y=0.5) transferring items to the Wooden Chest

### Belt Groups
- Belt Group connecting positions (x=-26.5, y=-65.5) to (x=-22.5, y=-65.5)
- Belt Group connecting positions (x=-23.5, y=-64.5) to (x=-21.5, y=-64.5)
- Belt Group connecting positions (x=-20.5, y=-64.5) to (x=-20.5, y=-66.5)
- Belt Group connecting positions (x=-14.5, y=-63.5) to (x=-14.5, y=-65.5)
- Belt Group connecting positions (x=-18.5, y=-63.5) to (x=-16.5, y=-63.5) and (x=-12.5, y=-60.5) to (x=-12.5, y=-58.5)
- Belt Group connecting positions (x=-14.5, y=-54.5) to (x=-14.5, y=-56.5) and (x=-17.5, y=-57.5) to (x=-17.5, y=-59.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Burner Inserter Not Working
- Ensure that the burner inserter has a valid fuel source and is correctly positioned to pick up and drop items. Check the fuel level and the status of the inserter to ensure it is working.

### Incorrect Inserter Pickup Position
- Verify that the pickup position of the inserter is set correctly. The pickup position should match the intended source position. Adjust the inserter's configuration to ensure it is aligned with the correct pickup point.
